com.java.model.map

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.model.map.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the Continent, the name, the control value which is the number of armies to be given once a player conquer a continent. Also, the continent holds a player id as conqueror.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
